oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mary Esperandieu Bolli Sketchbook
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sketchbook of Mary Louise Esperandieu Bolli. Dated entries range from 1850 to 1886 and include autographs, writings, botanical samples, and pen, pencil and watercolor drawings. The Esperandieu and Bolli families came from Switzerland and were part of the Knox County Swiss American community.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Sketchbooks; Art; Drawings;
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Loaned for copying and returned to owner.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
